solution_line_template: Normally, it would take her {normal_time_per_cake}*{num_cakes}=<<{normal_time_per_cake}*{num_cakes}={normal_total_time}>>{normal_total_time} minutes
With her sprained wrist it will take her {sprained_wrist_time_per_cake}*{num_cakes}=<<{sprained_wrist_time_per_cake}*{num_cakes}={sprained_wrist_total_time}>>{sprained_wrist_total_time} minutes
